data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Zamora, Castilla y León, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zamora, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Zamora, Castilla y León, Spain to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Zamora.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 148,161 cultural Christians in the county of Zamora to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the South Asian, general people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Zamora.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Zamora, Castilla y León, Spain the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Zamora.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
